attributes.action: Transform the House of Commons into the Parliament of All England, and the House of Lords into the Senate of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The establishment of an elected Parliament of All England, and an elected chamber of the Senate of the United Kingdom.  England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland to be governed locally, including tax revenue, and with Foreign Relations, Defence and Europe governed by the Senate.
